greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array A(n,k), n>=0, k>=0, read by antidiagonals, where column k is the expansion of e.g.f. exp(Sum_{i=0..k} x^i/i! - exp(x)).
formula: E.g.f. of column k: Product_{i>k} exp(-x^i/i!).
A(0,k) = 1, A(1,k) = A(2,k) = ... = A(k,k) = 0 and A(n,k) = - Sum_{i=k..n-1} binomial(n-1,i)*A(n-1-i,k) for n > k.
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Sep 29 2017
